name: Root Snek
description:
Grow into a mighty tree by collecting all the shiny water orbs! But be careful not to hit your own roots, or run out of water as you slowly creep through the soil.

Controls

  • Gamepad: Left analogue stick
  • Keyboard: Left and Right arrow keys or A and D keys
  • Mouse: Left and Right mouse buttons

Credits
Koen Gabriëls - Art
Jordy van Opstal - Code
Roxanne van Dam - Code
